Uses of Package
edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz

Packages that use edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz
Package
Description
edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz
An example of the Observer patterns inspired by https://plantsvszombies.fandom.com/wiki/Plants_vs._Zombies_Heroes The set up is there are plants and zombies on the board the game is the subject and it can be observed for Attack, Bonus Attack, and Destroyed events.
  • Classes in edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz used by edu.ccsu.designpatterns.pvz
    Class
    Description
    Event
    A game event that holds the cause of the event and the event type.
    EventType
    Enumeration of event types.
    Game
    Simple game Singleton that keeps track of a list of plants and zombies that can be a subject for observation of game events.
    GameEventObserver
    Interface for classes that want to observe game event subjects.
    GamePiece
    Represents a game piece for this game.
    GameSubject
    A Game Event subject that can be observed for game events.
    Plant
    Plant game piece
    Zombie
    Represents a zombie game piece
